list_definition.definition: an instrument for measuring, especially quantities of electricity, gas, water etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: If you want to know how much electricity you have used, you will have to look at the meter.

list_definition.definition: to measure (especially electricity etc) by using a meter
